description:
Catarina and a few of her friends set out on a journey to find Keith, assisted by Larna. Catarina still believes Keith left because of her. She tries her hardest to find some sort of clue in the first town they stop in, but there`s no useful information to be found. In the midst of all this, the captured Keith worries about the sister he left behind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キースがいなくなってしまった... 中編
